title: Replace video hero with static botanical image and text shadow

requirements.text: Replace the video background in the hero section (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) with a static image of multiple plants from a botanical garden or plant collection

quotes: use image of a multiple plants

acceptanceCriteria: Video element is removed from hero section
Static image element displays botanical/garden scene with multiple plants
Image covers full hero section width and height
Image uses object-fit: cover for proper scaling

requirements.text: Remove all overlay elements from the hero section background image including dark overlays, gradient overlays, and any semi-transparent layers

quotes: do not add any type of overlay over the image

acceptanceCriteria: No overlay div elements are rendered on top of the background image
Background image is fully visible without any darkening or color filters
No CSS filters or opacity adjustments are applied to the image

requirements.text: Add text shadow effect to the hero section headline text to ensure readability against the static botanical image background
acceptanceCriteria: Headline text has visible text-shadow CSS property applied
Text shadow provides sufficient contrast for readability
Text shadow is subtle and does not create harsh visual artifacts
All headline text elements in the hero section have shadow applied

requirements.text: Ensure no solid color box or background container is added behind the headline text in the hero section

quotes: do not add solid color behind the headline

acceptanceCriteria: Headline text does not have a background-color property
No container div with background color wraps the headline
Text appears directly over the botanical image with only text shadow for visibility

requirements.text: Remove all dynamic color transition animations and animated gradient effects from the hero section background

quotes: do not put transition dynamic color layout
do not put a layer of dynamic color

acceptanceCriteria: No CSS animations or transitions affect the background color
No animated gradient overlays are present
Background remains completely static with no color changes or movements
Hero section uses only the static botanical image without any dynamic effects

constraints: Maintain existing hero section layout and text positioning
Preserve all other hero section animations (text fade-in, floating elements) that do not relate to background color transitions
Keep the hero section responsive across all breakpoints
nonGoals: Adding video elements or video backgrounds
Implementing overlay layers of any kind
Adding background boxes or containers behind text
Creating animated gradients or color transitions

required: Wide botanical garden scene with multiple plants including various green foliage, flowers, and natural lighting for hero section background (hero-botanical-garden.dim_1920x1080.png)
